name: GlossaryTerm
description: A semantic description of something, such as a concept, object, asset, technology, role or group.

name: ControlledGlossaryTerm
description: Defines a glossary term that is developed through a controlled workflow.

name: Asset
description: The description of an asset that needs to be catalogued and governed.

name: DataSet
description: Collection of related data.

name: DataStore
description: A physical store of data.

name: Infrastructure
description: Physical infrastructure or software platform.

name: Process
description: Well-defined sequence of activities performed by people or software components.

name: DeployedAPI
description: A callable interface running at an endpoint.

name: DesignModel
description: A curated collection of design model elements.

name: ReferenceCodeMappingTable
description: A data set containing mappings between code values from different data sets.

name: Form
description: A collection of data items used to request activity.

name: KeyStoreCollection
description: A data set containing authentication and related security information.

name: ReferenceCodeTable
description: A data set containing code values and their translations.

name: MediaCollection
description: A group of related media files.

name: Topic
description: A location for storing and distributing related events.

name: DeployedReport
description: A collection if data items that describe a situation.

name: MetadataCollection
description: A data set containing metadata.

name: DeployedDatabaseSchema
description: A collection of database tables and views running in a database server.

name: InformationView
description: A data set containing selected data items from one or more data stores or data sets.

name: SubscriberList
description: A data set containing a list of endpoints registered to receive events from a topic.

name: DocumentStore
description: Identifies a data store as one that contains documents.

name: DataFile
description: A description of a file containing data stored in a file system.

name: MetadataRepository
description: A data store containing metadata.

name: GraphStore
description: Identifies a data store as one that contains one or more graphs.

name: CohortRegistryStore
description: A data store containing cohort membership registration details.

name: FileFolder
description: A description of a folder (directory) in a file system.

name: Database
description: A data store containing relational data.

name: KeystoreFile
description: An encrypted data store containing authentication and related security information.

name: MediaFile
description: A data file containing unstructured data.

name: LogFile
description: Identifies a data file as one containing log records.

name: CSVFile
description: A description of a comma separated value (CSV) file

name: JSONFile
description: A description of a file that follows the JavaScript Object Notation specification.

name: AvroFile
description: A description of a file that follows the Apache Avro specification.

name: Document
description: A data file containing unstructured text.

name: DataFolder
description: A folder (directory) in a file system that contains a collection of data.

name: ITInfrastructure
description: Hardware and base software that supports an IT system.

name: SoftwareServer
description: Software services to support a runtime environment for applications and data stores.

name: Host
description: Named IT infrastructure system that supports multiple software servers.

name: SoftwareServerPlatform
description: Software services to support a runtime environment for a software server.

name: Network
description: Inter-connectivity for systems.

name: HostCluster
description: A group of hosts operating together to provide a scalable platform.

name: VirtualContainer
description: Container-based virtual host.

name: DeployedSoftwareComponent
description: A packaged and deployed software component supporting a well-defined function.

name: OpenDiscoveryService
description: A pluggable component for discovering properties about an asset.

name: OpenDiscoveryPipeline
description: A pluggable component that calls multiple discovery services.

name: SchemaElement
description: An element that is part of a schema definition.

name: SchemaType
description: A specific type description.

name: SchemaAttribute
description: A schema element that nests another schema type in its parent.

name: SchemaLinkElement
description: A link to a type in a different schema.

name: SimpleSchemaType
description: A single valued type.

name: ComplexSchemaType
description: A schema type that has a complex structure of nested attributes and types.

name: MapSchemaType
description: A schema type for a map between a key and value.

name: APISchemaType
description: Description of an API.

name: LiteralSchemaType
description: A fixed simple value.

name: SchemaTypeChoice
description: A list of alternative schema types for attribute.

name: APIOperation
description: Description of an API operation.

name: PrimitiveSchemaType
description: A specific primitive type.

name: EnumSchemaType
description: A single valued type with fixed list of valid values.

name: TabularColumnType
description: A schema type for a column oriented data structure.

name: SimpleDocumentType
description: A primitive attribute for a hierarchical data structure.

name: RelationalColumnType
description: A type for a relational column.

name: DocumentSchemaType
description: A schema type for a hierarchical data structure.

name: BoundedSchemaType
description: A schema type that limits the number of values that can be stored.

name: EventType
description: A description of an event (message)

name: TabularSchemaType
description: A schema type for a table oriented data structure.

name: RelationalDBSchemaType
description: A schema type for a relational database.

name: GraphSchemaType
description: A schema type for a graph data structure.

name: StructSchemaType
description: A schema type that has a list of attributes, typically of different types.

name: ObjectSchemaType
description: A schema attribute for an object.

name: ArraySchemaType
description: A schema type that has a list of values of the same type.

name: SetSchemaType
description: A schema type that is an unordered group of values of the same type.

name: ArrayDocumentType
description: An array in a hierarchical data structure.

name: SetDocumentType
description: A set in a hierarchical data structure.

name: RelationalTableType
description: A table type for a relational database.

name: StructDocumentType
description: A structure within a hierarchical data structure.

name: MapDocumentType
description: A map in a hierarchical data structure.

name: RelationalTable
description: A table within a relational database schema type.

name: DerivedSchemaAttribute
description: An attribute that is made up of values from another attribute.

name: DocumentSchemaAttribute
description: A schema attribute for a hierarchical data structure.

name: TabularColumn
description: A column attribute for a table oriented data structure.

name: GraphEdge
description: A schema attribute for a graph data structure.

name: GraphVertex
description: A schema attribute for a graph data structure.

name: ObjectAttribute
description: An attribute in an object schema type.

name: DerivedRelationalColumn
description: A relational column that is derived from other columns.

name: RelationalColumn
description: A column within a relational table.
